message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering the value this product can bring to your life.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'm looking for in a product like this.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $800000. This is a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your life.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $750000, but no higher. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $775000. This is still a great deal, considering the value this product can bring to your life.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $760000, but no higher. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $760000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $780000. This is still a great deal, considering the value this product can bring to your life.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to go up to $770000, but no higher. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're getting close to your limit. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $770000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $790000. This is still a great deal, considering the value this product can bring to your life.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm at my limit. I'm not willing to go above $770000. I think we've reached a stalemate. I'm going to have to consider buying from John for $1500000 if we can't come to an agreement.
